  Lunarpine exited the CR chamber looking over at the one he placed Ice in.=
 She was still sedated by the chamber. Her outburst could've lobotomized he=
r, he should have predicted this. She was telepathic and was never exposed =
to so many emotions. He walked around the room for a bit before setting out=
. He opened a comm to Razor Claw but got no response. The Raptor was a good=
 enough fighter that Lunarpine didn't fear for his safety, but the lack of =
response still concerned him. The raptor was still one of Veratis' creation=
s and would have to return with them. The wolfbot had other priorities firs=
t, responsability to his leader came first, his leader and his love.
